topic.title: A Tale As Old As Time
topic.shortdesc: Welcome! Come along with me as I tell a tale as old as time. It is the story of Belle, a hidden gem in a small village, and how crossing paths with a lonesome beast changed her life in a way she never would have imagined.

section.title: Introduction
section.p: In a land far, far away lived a warm and kindhearted girl named Belle. She lived with her dad in the quaint village of Villeneuve, where everyone knew each other. She would teach children how to read, as well as help other members of the community with many different things. There was also Gaston, who always had his eyes on her. He "loved" her and wanted to marry her for her looks. Little did she know what her future would hold...

image.alt: Belle smiles at her father as she helps him fix something in his shop.

section.title: Introduction
section.p: In a land far, far away lived a kind and pure-hearted girl named Belle. She lived with her dad, Maurice, in the quaint village of Villeneuve, where everyone knew each other. She would teach children how to read, as well as help other members of the community with various tasks. There was also Gaston, who always pursued her and flirted with her. He loved her the moment he set his eyes on her--almost as much as he loved himself. Little did she knowwhat her future would hold and what road she would go down that would eventually lead her to finding true love.

image.alt: Belle smiles at her father as she helps him fix something in his shop.
